heading: Elimelech and his family go to Moab because of famine—His sons marry—The father and sons die—Ruth, the Moabitess, her husband having died, remains constant to Naomi—They come to Bethlehem.

And Mahlon and Chilion died also both of them; and the woman was left of her two sons and her husband.
